title: OfA Ban Idea: Everyone Gets to Ban One Champ
body: OfA banning seems to be more about who you don't want to play rather than who you don't want to fight. If it's gonna be that way, I think every player should have a say in who they don't want to play. Doesn't even have to be a ban for both teams, each player on your team can ban one champ from being voted on. That way you don't have to see the exact same champ for the 10th game in a row. Better that than have one dude get full veto power on any idea anyone suggests before ban phase ends. Few games back, some guy goes "who's up for Nami?", banner instantly bans Nami. Ugh.

replies.body:
All draft modes that aren't ranked SR should work like this. Hell, ARAM should work like this.

There's no excuse to not have a better ban system in all the modes that Riot doesn't even attempt to balance.

One for All is definitely best enjoyed with a group of at least 3, preferably a full premade. But with at least 3, you have a good shot that one of you is banning, and you can guarantee you get the champ you all pick.
